column2: "Me ba
column4: Na fa me mbrasɛm sie wo nkyɛn."

column2: "Dzi me mbransɛm do
column3: na nya nkwa; Na yɛ me mbra dɛ w'enyiwa kyiresua."

column2: "Kyekyer no wɔ wo nsatseaba do; Kyerɛw no wɔ w'akoma pon do."
"Se nyansa dɛ
column3: Ɔwo nye m'akyerɛbaa; Na frɛ ntseasee dɛ wo nyɛnko berɛbo:"

column2: "Ama woeesie wo efi ɔbaa sansanyi no ho
column3: Efi ɔbaa sansanyi a ɔka adɔkɔdɔkɔsɛm no nsamu."

column2: "Na mifi me dan mu tokura mu
"Na muhun ntsetsekwaa mu
"Orutwa mu wɔ abɔntsen mbrɛ ɔbɛn ɔbaa no ne nsaaba mu
column3: Na ɔdze faa ne fie kwan;"

column2: "Ewimbibaamu
"Na
"Ɔbɔ ndze na ɔyɛ ntsintsiman; N'anan nntsena ne fie:"
"Sesei na ɔwɔ abrɔn mu
"Nna ɔdze ne nsa braa no
"Asomdwee ho afɔrbɔ da mo do; Ndɛ da yi metua m'anohobadze."
"Dɛm ntsi na mepue ebehyia wo kwan
"Medze kuntu a woedzi mu edwin asɛw me mpa do
"Medze nduhuam dɛ: mɛɛr
column3: alɔe na sinamɔn Egugu me kɛtɛ do huanhuam."

column2: "Bra ma ɔdɔ mmee hɛn araa nkodu anapa; Ma yɛmfa ɔdɔ nkyekye hɛn werɛ."
"Na ofiwura nnyi fie
"Ɔafa sika kotoku ma kɔ; Ɔbosoom yɛ mu a
"Ɔdze asɛndɛw pii maa ɔdze noho mae
column3: Ɔdze ano fenemfenem nyaa no ma ɔkɔree. Awerɛfir mu ara na ɔtaa no do"

column2: "Dɛ ɔnantwi a ɔrokɔ ekumii
column3: Anaadɛ mpokyerɛ a wɔdze twe ɔkwasea n'aso;"

column2: "Kodu dɛ egyen menaba bohwira ne berɛbo mu. Ɔtse dɛ mbrɛ anoma no ho yɛ har kɔtɔ efir mu
column3: Naaso onnyim dɛ woesua ama no nkwa no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column5: Na hom nyɛ aso mma m'anomu nsɛm."

column2: "Mma mma w'akoma nntɔ nnkɔ n'atsempɔn do
column3: Mma nntɔ dɔnsuar nnkefir n'akwan do."

column2: "Osiandɛ oepirapira piinara ahwehwe famu: Nyew
column3: hɔn a wɔatotɔr wɔ ne nsamu yɛ dɔm kɛsenara."

column2: "Fa ne fie kwan do na hwɛ
column3: Na ɔdze wo bɔkɔ owu mu
